short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes hardcoded values to custom ones.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Currently, the status text in Jira tasks doesn’t always align with the column names on our Jira board, leading to confusion. This extension automatically updates those status values to match the correct column names, eliminating the need to manually move tasks or memorize status meanings.

There is no setup or interface required—it works right out of the box, ensuring the text strings are updated within 500ms.
